abstract: Netscape co-founder Marc Andreessen, Charles River Ventures and SoftTech VC have bet $3.5 million on SocialMedia Networks, creator of an ad and analytics network for widget makers on social networks like Facebook and MySpace.
lead_paragraph: Netscape co-founder Marc Andreessen, Charles River Ventures and SoftTech VC have bet $3.5 million on SocialMedia Networks, creator of an ad and analytics network for widget makers on social networks like Facebook and MySpace.
